name: Rook Warp
description:
Made for the 7DRL Jam 

You are a flying space castle looking for the key to the maze while trying to gain as many stars as possible by killing enemies 

Shortcut keys for desktop

left and right - to turn

up- move , stop, or attack

down - run if in combat

a - first button at bottom 'wpn'

s - second button at bottom 'defense'

d- third button at bottom 'knight' 

f- back button for ability menu

Credits

Music - John Leonard French

Sound - Imphenzia
